thread.title: Caribbean Airlines Flights Disrupted Due to Closure of Jamaican Air Space
thread.title_full: Caribbean Airlines Flights Disrupted Due to Closure of Jamaican Air Space | Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Caribbean Airlines Flights Disrupted Due to Closure of Jamaican Air Space
text:
Caribbean Airlines Flights Disrupted Due to Closure of Jamaican Air Space Published on : Tuesday, July 21, 2015
Caribbean Airlines advises that due to ongoing industrial action in Jamaica, the country’s air space has been shut down resulting in disruptions to the following Caribbean Airlines flights:
BW 0016, Sunday July 19 – departing John F. Kennedy International, New York to Norman Manley International, Jamaica BW 0031, Sunday July 19 – departing Norman Manley International, Kingston Jamaica to Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood International, Florida BW 0030, Sunday July 19 – departing Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood International, Florida to Montego Bay, Jamaica BW 0010, Sunday July 19 – departing John F. Kennedy International, New York to Montego Bay, Jamaica
Caribbean Airlines immediately activated its call out plan to contact customers travelling on these services. However, customers are advised to keep checking flight information at www.caribbean-airlines.com or contact the Caribbean Airlines call centers:
USA: 1.800.920.4225 Jamaica (International): 1.800.523.5585 Jamaica (Local calls): 1.888.359.2475
Caribbean Airlines apologizes for any inconvenience caused, but the circumstances leading to the flight disruptions were completely outside of the control of the airline.
Tags: caribbean airlines , Jamaican Air Space
